column5: new to the area and just wondering if anyone has braved the southern lakes in the camnridge/ kitchener area?
Not sure if there's any fishing there, but my wife saw snowmobiles out on Puslinch Lake today.  JF
i was thinking about going out saturday on pusilnch for "old big teeth" . at least i know there's still sufficient ice . thanks JF
Old Big Teeth? Sounds like a story.  JF
Please watch for the spring and thin ice in some area. There is at least one or two of them. Good luck.
I would not be ventureing on any ice in the K/W area Ice right now.... GRCA is adviseing against it right now...or atleast thats what they said on the news last night.
